## ESPnet2 ASR model

### `espnet/wanchichen_fleurs_asr_conformer_hier_lid_utt`
This model was trained by William Chen using the fleurs recipe in [espnet](https://github.com/espnet/espnet/).
### Demo: How to use in ESPnet2
```bash
cd espnet
pip install -e .
cd egs2/fleurs/asr1
./run.sh
```
